tool_description: Provide latitude and longitude, request lines to be returned.  Elevation will be returned with this call for the requested latitude and longitude.
name: Distance to Coast by Province with Elevation
title: Distance to Coast by Province with Elevation
tool_name: Distance to Coast by Province with Elevation

api_list.name: Distance to Coast by Province with Elevation
api_list.description: Provide latitude and longitude, indicate if distance lines are to be returned by the response.  Elevation of the given point will be returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distance-to-coast-by-province-with-elevation.p.rapidapi.com/distance-to-coast-elevation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance-to-coast-by-province-with-elevation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
